articles.content: By India Today Sports Desk: Matheesha Pathirana’s sister Vishuka was over the moon after MS Dhoni went to meet the Chennai Super Kings (CSK) pacer’s family. She didn’t forget to get a few pictures cl… [+1503 chars]

articles.title: Bruno Fernandes Explains Spat With Chelsea Players After He Appeared to Mock Kepa - Sports Brief
articles.description: Bruno Fernandes' penalty celebration against Chelsea seemingly angered Enzo Fernandez, who reacted angrily during their Premier League clash on May 25.
